info.title: Unison agent API
info.description: API for opensource nextflow runner agent. A federation node

200.description: Get next task for runner agent
Mark task as completed, not showing it again next time

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Run ID, example: 1234. It may be taken from /next-task API method
